Contributor.Department: Department of Developmental Biology and Cancer Research

Sample.Title: hbdTSC_E2_rep1

Channel.Growth-Protocol: hiTSC and hbdTSC cells were grown on a layer of Mitomycin C-treated mouse embryonic fibroblast (MEF) feeder cells and cultured in human TSC medium (Okae et al, 2018). HFFs were grown in DMEM containing 10%FBS, 1% L-glutamine and 1% penicillin-streptomycin. hESCs and hiPSCs were grown in human embryonic stem cell (hES) medium comprised of Knockout DMEM containing 15% KnockOut serum replacement, 0.1 mM 2-mercaptoethanol, 1% L-glutamine, 1% non-essential amino acids and 1% Penicillin-Streptomycin, supplemented with freshly added 4ng/ml bFGF.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA was isolated using the Macherey-Nagel RNA NucleoSpin kit (Ornat) mRNA libraries were prepared using the SENSE mRNA-seq library prep kit V2 (Lexogen)

Sample.Data-Processing: Raw reads were quality-trimmed and adapters removed using trim_galore (version 0.6.5) The processed fastq files were mapped to the mouse transcriptome and genome using HISAT2 (v2.1.0). The genome version was GRCh38. Quantification was done using htseq-count (version 0.13.5) Differential analysis was done using the R package DESeq2 (version 1.28.1) Genome_build: GRCh38

Channel.Growth-Protocol: hiTSC and hbdTSC cells were grown on a layer of Mitomycin C-treated mouse embryonic fibroblast (MEF) feeder cells and cultured in human TSC medium (Okae et al, 2018). HFFs were grown in DMEM containing 10%FBS, 1% L-glutamine and 1% penicillin-streptomycin. hESCs and hiPSCs were grown in human embryonic stem cell (hES) medium comprised of Knockout DMEM containing 15% KnockOut serum replacement, 0.1 mM 2-mercaptoethanol, 1% L-glutamine, 1% non-essential amino acids and 1% Penicillin-Streptomycin, supplemented with freshly added 4ng/ml bFGF.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA was isolated using the Macherey-Nagel RNA NucleoSpin kit (Ornat) mRNA libraries were prepared using the SENSE mRNA-seq library prep kit V2 (Lexogen)

Sample.Data-Processing: Raw reads were quality-trimmed and adapters removed using trim_galore (version 0.6.5) The processed fastq files were mapped to the mouse transcriptome and genome using HISAT2 (v2.1.0). The genome version was GRCh38. Quantification was done using htseq-count (version 0.13.5) Differential analysis was done using the R package DESeq2 (version 1.28.1) Genome_build: GRCh38

Series.Title: Pluripotency-Independent Induction of Human Trophoblast Stem Cells from Fibroblasts [RNA-Seq]
Series.Summary: Transcription profile analysis revealed similarity/dissimilarity between human blastocyst derived trophoblast stem cells (hbdTSCss), human induced trophoblast stem cells (hiTSCs), human foreskin fibroblasts (HFFs) and pluripotent stem cells (hESCs, hiPSCs)
Series.Overall-Design: HFFs reprogrammed into hiTSC lines by transient ectopic expression of GATA3, OCT4, KLF4, MYC (GOKM) were subjected to RNA-seq, along with samples of HFFs, hbdTSCss, hESCs and hiPSCs
Series.Type: Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing
